head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths DOLGIN, DEBORAH G.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths DOLGIN, DEBORAH G.

block.p: DOLGIN--Deborah G. Loving wife of Stuart. Cherished mother of Rachel and Sammy. Adored daughter of Michael and Judith Gilman. Dear sister of Lisa (Susan) Letteney. Services Thursday February 1, 11 am at Temple Beth El of Great Neck, 5 Old Mill Rd., Great Neck, NY. Under the direction of Riverside -Nassau North Chapels.

DOLGIN--Deborah G. Loving wife of Stuart. Cherished mother of Rachel and Sammy. Adored daughter of Michael and Judith Gilman. Dear sister of Lisa (Susan) Letteney. Services Thursday February 1, 11 am at Temple Beth El of Great Neck, 5 Old Mill Rd., Great Neck, NY. Under the direction of Riverside -Nassau North Chapels.
